COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe4
STRING: I finished my last class of the year with Ms. Cordell, and
then headed to the practice room at the far end of the
hallway, as if this was another course in my curriculum.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x104
STRING: I had no intention of destroying my relationship with
Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x110
STRING: But, a completely different part of me just wanted to do
what I could to help a certain girl, named Falsita
Fawcett.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x130
STRING: I wasn't lying to myself, or trying to deceive anyone.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x188
STRING: [Fal] “Oh... Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19e
STRING: [Chris] “I came for practice...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d0
STRING: [Fal] “Of course.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e6
STRING: Before I sat down in front of my Fortelle and placed my
fingers on the keyboard, there was one thing that I had
to do.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fc
STRING: [Chris] “Listen, Fal...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22e
STRING: [Fal] “Yes...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x244
STRING: [Chris] “There's something I need to say to you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x276
STRING: [Fal] “Okay...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28c
STRING: [Chris] “What I'm going to say might sound stupid, and
you might wonder why on earth I'm saying it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ac
STRING: I truly hoped that I had just been getting the wrong
idea.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b8
STRING: There would be nothing wrong with me being subject
to embarrassment, if that meant everything would be
wrapped up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ea
STRING: [Fal] “Is it about Arietta...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x300
STRING: [Chris] “How did you know about...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31e
STRING: [Fal] “Tortinita told me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34c
STRING: Well... Actually, I kind of made her tell me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37a
STRING: I'm sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x386
STRING: [Chris] “No... That's okay. But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b8
STRING: [Fal] “Good. Tortinita did nothing wrong. So, that's how
it is then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d8
STRING: [Chris] “Uh... Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ee
STRING: If what she was saying was true, then all of this was just
me getting ahead of myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x404
STRING: Although... I didn't think that I was stupid enough to
simply believe that I was misinterpreting the various
things I had felt from her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x436
STRING: [Fal] “Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x44c
STRING: [Chris] “Yes?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x47e
STRING: [Fal] “Singing is what I love.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x494
STRING: Shifting her gaze slightly, Fal started to talk about
something entirely different.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c6
STRING: [Fal] “I am truly glad that I was able to get into this
school, and for the past three years, I have taken a very
serious approach to everything I've done.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4f0
STRING: I simply nodded.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x518
STRING: [Fal] “So for me, this graduation recital is a really, really
important thing. It's not just something I have to do in
order to graduate, it's a special...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x542
STRING: Her voice trailed off at the end, and I could not make
out what she said.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x54e
STRING: But, I understood more than enough what she wanted
to say, and what she was feeling.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x564
STRING: [Chris] “But... Why me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x57a
STRING: That's what I wanted to know.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x586
STRING: Why would she choose me?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x592
STRING: In these three years since I got into this school, I had
been doing my best.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5a8
STRING: But, I had always felt that I didn't mesh with the essence
of this school.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5b4
STRING: I had been unable to find a balance between the things
I wanted to do and the things I did not, and felt that I
was not acknowledged, except by a small number of
teachers.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ca
STRING: And then just after we had met, Fal wanted me, of all
people, to be her partner for her very important
graduation recital.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5fc
STRING: [Fal] “It's hard to put the reason into words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x62a
STRING: But after I first heard the way you play, and then
rehearsing with you...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x662
STRING: I felt something.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x66e
STRING: [Chris] “You felt something...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x68c
STRING: [Fal] “I felt that you have that something that I am
lacking.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6a2
STRING: That strange something that I felt when we performed,
that Phorni and I had discussed this morning.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6b8
STRING: Had Fal been aware of it too?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6c4
STRING: [Chris] “I... Don't know what that something is, though.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6f0
STRING: [Chris] “But, if I can help you with that, even in the
slightest way, then...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x72c
STRING: [Fal] “Chris...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x742
STRING: [Chris] “That's the reason why I'm here again today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x774
STRING: [Fal] “Thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x78c
STRING: All she said were those two words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x798
STRING: And then, her gaze fell to the score in front of her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7a4
STRING: For a split second, I was captivated by the way she
averted her gaze.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7b0
STRING: For a moment, we both said nothing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7c6
STRING: It was not uncomfortable, it was simply a moment that
we needed to gauge the distance between us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7f8
STRING: [Fal] “Well then...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x80e
STRING: [Chris] “Alright.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x840
STRING: [Fal] “Shall we start practicing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x856
STRING: [Chris] “Go easy on me, if you can.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x888
STRING: [Fal] “No way. Didn't I just tell you that I wanted my
graduation recital to be perfect?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8a8
STRING: [Chris] “Am I pushing it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8da
STRING: [Fal] “It's far too late to be saying that now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8f0
STRING: The room was filled with an audaciously bright feeling,
and with neither of us taking the lead, I sat at my
Fortelle and looked at my score.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9a8
STRING: The walls absorbed the final lingering sounds of my
Fortelle, and created a silent sound as if everything had
come to a halt.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9be
STRING: I could hear Fal's heavy breathing clearly now, as if she
were whispering in my ear.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9d4
STRING: I had almost never ever complimented myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9e0
STRING: But just for today, I felt as if it were okay to give myself
a pat on the back.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa1a
STRING: [Fal] “Phew...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa44
STRING: Fal took a large breath and exhaled, and then smiled.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa5a
STRING: She had no words of praise, no critique of our
performance, nothing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa66
STRING: These things were not needed, as the two of us were
aware of everything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa7c
STRING: [Chris] “Recitals are in about a month and a half?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaae
STRING: [Fal] “Yes. I think we have plenty of time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xac4
STRING: [Chris] “It's probably not good to be overconfident,
though.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaf6
STRING: [Fal] “It's not good to be too belittling either, though.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb24
STRING: Being able to evaluate yourself correctly is most
important.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb3a
STRING: [Chris] “Good point.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb52
STRING: After some time had passed and the feeling of elation
was beginning to fade, I started to notice that my
fingers and shoulders were much more tired than I had
thought.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb68
STRING: Practice that made you lose track of time was never
tiring, not while you were maintaining your
concentration.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb9a
STRING: [Fal] “Tired?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbb0
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, a little.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbe2
STRING: [Fal] “Oh, just a little? Let's keep going at this pace
tomorrow, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc02
STRING: [Chris] “Umm... Are we going to be practicing
everyday?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc34
STRING: [Fal] “Hrm... That's something we'll have to discuss
later...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc6c
STRING: Well, I suppose we should at least take it a little easier
during Natale.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc82
STRING: Fal kind of smiled implicitly, and finished speaking on a
cheerful note.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc98
STRING: For the time being, it seemed I would at least be able
to relax during Natale.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcae
STRING: [Chris] “That's a relief to hear.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xce0
STRING: [Fal] “Aha-ha.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd06
STRING: But tomorrow is going to be another hard day of
practice, you know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd12
STRING: [Chris] “Yes, yes, as you command.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd44
STRING: [Fal] “Hmph...!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd5a
STRING: [Chris] “Let's get packed up.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdd0
STRING: [Fal] “Why don't we decide on a basic plan for
tomorrow?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xde6
STRING: At the three -street junction where we often parted
ways, Fal decided to confirm what we would be doing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdfc
STRING: [Chris] “I guess we should meet around midday? As for
the place... Lets use the school.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe2e
STRING: [Fal] “So, I was thinking about the time, maybe we could
start a little earlier?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe44
STRING: [Chris] “A little earlier... That sounds like you mean in
the morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe76
STRING: [Fal] “How does ten o' clock sound? It's not so early if
you think of it as the same as going class.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe96
STRING: [Chris] “Thinking of a day off as the same as a school
day, might not be...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xed2
STRING: [Fal] “Then, what about your place?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xee8
STRING: [Chris] “That's even worse, I won't be able to break out
of holiday mode.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf1a
STRING: [Fal] “Fine...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf48
STRING: Okay, how about this? What if you think of it as going
to a friends house to visit?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf5e
STRING: [Chris] “A friends house? What, like Asino's?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf90
STRING: [Fal] “Umm, there happens to be someone right in front
of you? A friend who also just became your recital
partner.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfb0
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... Ohhh. That's what you mean.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfe2
STRING: [Fal] “That's what I mean.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xff8
STRING: [Chris] “For practice. But then...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x102a
STRING: [Fal] “But then...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1040
STRING: [Chris] “Visiting a girl's place is...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1072
STRING: [Fal] “Awkward for you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1088
STRING: [Chris] “I guess so.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ba
STRING: [Fal] “You could deny it just a little, you know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10d0
STRING: [Chris] “But I'm really not used to that kind of thing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10fa
STRING: I jokingly responded to her, and as expected she
laughed a little.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1110
STRING: If we went to my place, it would have been better as I
would have Phorni around.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x111c
STRING: It wasn't like I wanted someone to attest to what kind
of friends Fal and I were, but entering a deeper
relationship other than for music could end up in a
bitter result for both of us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1158
STRING: [Fal] “Alright... Since you're going to be like that, I'll add
in an extra bonus. That way you won't be able to say
no.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1178
STRING: [Chris] “An... Added bonus?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1196
STRING: [Fal] “If you come over in the morning, practice will
come with two meals. How about it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ac
STRING: [Chris] “You're going to cook...? That's tempting...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11c2
STRING: It was getting harder and harder to say no.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ce
STRING: I should have just gone with the idea of going to my
place.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11da
STRING: I couldn't go back and suggest my place or the school,
not anymore.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1202
STRING: [Fal] “I guess... We'll just start in the afternoon?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1218
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, um....”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x124a
STRING: [Fal] “Actually, there's something I haven't mentioned,
sorry... I'm going to be busy and won't be able to
practice from the end of Natale, until the day before
school starts again.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x127c
STRING: [Fal] “I should have told you earlier.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x129c
STRING: [Chris] “Until the day before school starts again... You
mean, until the 3rd?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ce
STRING: [Fal] “Yes. I was planning to mention it after we
partnered up, sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ee
STRING: [Chris] “Right, I see... Anyway, don't worry about it, I'm
partially to blame since I was slow to make a decision.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x132a
STRING: [Fal] “I suppose we won't be able to practice for about
one week. I will be able to come back on the 2nd, so
we should be able to practice on the 3rd.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x134a
STRING: [Chris] “Sure, that's no problem. Either way we'll be
practicing all day long after school starts again, so it
should be a good break for both of us. Are you going to
go somewhere?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1390
STRING: [Fal] “I was thinking of going back to visit my parents...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13a6
STRING: [Chris] “Oh really? But, I suppose even if you head back,
you'll still practice at home right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13ce
STRING: [Fal] “Of course.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13fc
STRING: You have to practice during the break too, you know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1412
STRING: [Chris] “Don't worry, I won't forget.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1430
STRING: [Fal] “Thanks. Now, about tomorrow...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1446
STRING: [Chris] “Practice, bright and early right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1478
STRING: [Fal] “Thank you...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x148e
STRING: [Chris] “Don't mention it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14c0
STRING: [Fal] “Okay, let's make it ten just in front of Copert. It's
easier that way.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14e0
STRING: I supposed it was too late to change where we were
going to practice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14ec
STRING: [Chris] “Fair enough. But, we're really going to practice
at your place?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x150a
STRING: [Fal] “We certainly are. See you tomorrow!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1520
STRING: [Chris] “Alright, see you then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x153a
STRING: I saw her off, and while returning to my apartment I
thought about the idea of taking Phorni with me
tomorrow.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1580
STRING: [Chris] “So, tomorrow it turns out I have to go to Fal's
place; do you want to come?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15a0
STRING: I assumed that she would say she wanted to come,
even if I didn't actually ask her to...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15da
STRING: [Phorni] “You're going to practice right? I'll just get in
the way, so, I'll pass.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15fa
STRING: [Chris] “Huh...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x162c
STRING: [Phorni] “Even if I did go, I won't be able to sing,
anyway. And also, you're running out of time, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x164c
STRING: [Chris] “You're awfully understanding today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x167e
STRING: [Phorni] “Hey, don't treat me like a child.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1694
STRING: [Chris] “But, you are pretty much like a child.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16c6
STRING: [Phorni] “Grr!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16dc
STRING: [Chris] “Going to come along whether I like it or not?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x170e
STRING: [Phorni] “Nope... I said I'll pass.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1724
STRING: [Chris] “Are you sure...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1756
STRING: [Phorni] “I said from the beginning that I'd pass!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x176c
STRING: Well, this was odd...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1794
STRING: [Phorni] “But instead...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17aa
STRING: [Chris] “Y-Yes?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17dc
STRING: [Phorni] “I'll help you practice after Natale is over. As
much as you like.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17fc
STRING: [Chris] “That's what you really want, isn't it...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x182e
STRING: [Phorni] “That's right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1844
STRING: I guessed it was best to leave it at that...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1850
STRING: [Chris] “Got it. I'll go by myself tomorrow, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x186e
STRING: [Phorni] “Sure. Make sure to practice hard, okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1884
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, I will.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x189a
STRING: It wasn't like her at all; Phorni seemed to be being extra
considerate.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18b0
STRING: But for the time being, I decided to go with it.
